version.bug: Fix handling of files in recent files list that no longer exist.
Fix handling of files that are renamed to .bak by another editor.
Fix bugs in Find/Replace clicking Replace repeatedly was broken. Added unit tests to cover this case.
Remove Help/Index since it went to the same place as Help/Content.
Fix bug in XSL transform of documents fetched from http location. Add unit test for this case.
Fix bug in rendering large documents using default stylesheet.
Fix layout bug of toolbar on high DPI screens.
Fix bug in support for non webview2 case.
Automatically register XML notepad with Open With dialog.
Added support for Chromium based WebView2 control for XSLT output. You can download this from https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-edge/webview2/.
Ctrl+A short cut for SaveAs interferes with text editing, so removed Ctrl+A shortcut from SaveAs.
One more fix to "openFileDialog1" default file name on schema dialog.
Fix tooltip in options dialog Default Text Editor option.

version.feature: Add user settable default text editor option for View Source.
version.bug: Fix Schema dialog so it doesn't set filename to "openFileDialog1".
Fix View/Source on http files (uses temp file).
Fix memory usage bug to do with loading huge XML files.
Report XSLT transform times in the status bar.

version.feature: Enable [github issue #86](https://github.com/microsoft/XmlNotepad/issues/86) - allow an XmlNotepad.settings file to be found in the same folder as XmlNotepad.exe and use this instead of the one in %LOCALAPPDATA%.
See [github issue #86](https://github.com/microsoft/XmlNotepad/issues/86) - add a browse button to help set XSLT output file name.

version.bug: Fix [github issue #87](https://github.com/microsoft/XmlNotepad/issues/87) - bug in finding text in attribute values and add unit tests to cover this. Also fixed problem with stepping through multiple matches using F3 in one big paragraph.

version.feature: Thanks to Austin Wise for adding High DPI scaling which makes the fonts a lot less blurry on high DPI screens.
Minor fixes to XML stats output got github issues #76 and #77.
Provide a way to disable google analytics before installing XML Notepad.
Check XML diff files are different files.
Add ability to import HTML files and convert them to XML using SgmlReader.
Add optional google analytics so we can get an idea of usage.

version.bug: Fix Dark Theme options editing and add new color for text editor background.
Fix performance bug to do with expanding too many nodes on save and on find.

version.feature: Fix bug in current file address combobox. Start implementing stylecop code cleanups.
Sync offline help so it matches the online help, fix some typos and add more info to options dialog help text.
Add auto-completion in location combobox and increased history to 1000 filenames.
Add support for "Dark" theme colors and a way to easily switch between light and dark theme.
Add transparent icons that look good on dark backgrounds

version.bug: Fix F1 help.
Fix locked file bug after doing xml comparison (github issue# 44).
Fix BOM option so it is honored on XSLT output files also (github issue# 46).
Fix problem with TLS 1.2 by upgrading to .NET Framework 4.7.2

version.feature: Merge fixes from shadolight and add options that control how XmlDiff behaves.
Merge change by Vincent Lepape which adds a new MaximumValueLength setting.

version.bug: Fix some layout bugs that happen when system font size is increased beyond 100%.

version.feature: Add output file field to XSL Output tab which fixes problems with relative links in the XSLT output.

version.bug: Thanks to Steve Romanow for fixing some old codeplex URL references.

version.feature: Add XML stats under View menu.
Add line numbers on the XML diff output.
version.bug: Fix navigation of differences

version.feature: Add ability to import *.csv files.
Add new option to allow you to save XML files without the UTF-8 byte order mark.
Add SHA 256 digital signature for stronger security.
version.bug: Fix regression in loading xml from http
Fix regression in copy & paste noedes

version.feature: Control over handling of long lines. Added new options "Maximum Line Length" and "Autoformat Long Lines"
Upgrade to .NET 4.0
Add support for picking different languages for Dynamic Help from xsd:documentation.
Add ability to select default File Associations for the app
version.bug: Find dialog should not always be "top most" window on the desktop
Make text in ErrorList window "word wrap" so you can read long error messages
Fix NormalizeText bug in XmlDiff reported by GalacticCowboy
Fix bug in how schemaLocation attribute is resolved so that validation results are more predictable
Add inner exception detail to error reporting, sometimes this provides more information about the error.
Fix XML compare for files containing greek characters as reported by Birbilis.
Fix synchronization of vertical position across tree view and text view.

version.feature: Add Proxy Authentication support
Add formatting options
Switch to out-of-process unit testing using IAccessibility only
version.bug: Unhandled exception on invalid syntax for xml declaration
Unable to reset splitter if accidently moved off screen
XSLT transform is not reloaded when it is changed on disk
Using a stylesheet containing a DTD doesn't work
Find by XPath should show all namespaces prefixes in scope
Fixed location of updates.xml page so auto-updater works properly
Fixed problems in incremental search (CTRL+I) giving up too soon
Fixed layout to remove margins around the TabControls and prettied up the XSLT output tab
Fixed Find (CTRL+F), Copy (CTRL+C) and View Source commands in XSLT output window
Fixed options dialog resize bug
Fix null reference exception on Window/New Window when window is empty
Turn off reload loading of previously opened file

version.feature: Added "change to" menu for changing node types
Added support for XInclude
Added DynamicHelp tab and Tooltips based on xsd:annotations
Added [next|prev] links to XmlDiff output window for navigating changes
Added support for loading XML documents containing illegal characters, reporting these errors in the error list
Added "Export Errors" option for saving contents of the error list to a file
Added "Goto Definition" option for navigating to XIncludes and XSD schemas
Added keyboard accelerators for inserting a child element (Ctrl+Insert) and a child attribute (Alt+Insert)
Added simple auto-updater to help user know when a new version is available
Added navigation combo box for easy entry of http file locations
Improved unit test coverage to 87%
version.bug: Fixed bug in task list when different sort order is in effect
Fixed bug in scroll bar not recalculating properly
Fixed focus issues with intellisense window
Clear undo stack when new file is loaded
Fixed a few null reference exceptions
Fixed bug in restoring window size when window is closed in minimized or maximized state
Fixed xsi:type attribute validation (properly this time!)
Fixed performance of changing namespace values on a large document
Made it so that Escape key closes intellisense drop down window without cancelling the edit which allows you to edit a value that is not in the list - which is important for simpleType unions

Fix performance and layout of find dialog
Track edits to xml-stylesheet processing instruction so XSLT output tab stays in sync
Fixed Compare Files...
Fixed file open and save as filters so the dialogs work properly when you select a different file type

version.feature: Added keyboard accelerators for find again (F3) and reverse find (SHIFT+F3)
Added support for loading IXmlBuilder and IXmlEditor implementations from different assemblies using new vs:assembly attribute
Made source code localizable by moving all error messages and dialog strings to .resx files
Added a default XSL transform
New icons, a play on the Vista "Notepad" icons

Performance of expand node when validating
